summary: An ENB preset that uses vanilla lighting. This ENB is a highly edited version of Ruvaak Dahmaan ENB.
descriptionHtml:
[b]DESCRIPTION:

[/b]I have always been a fan of Dragens's [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40088/?]Ruvaak Dahmaan ENB[/url], but while they look astounding, i personally have never been the biggest fan of the lighting mods out there. Thus Natural Atmospheres ENB was born. This ENB preset is meant to be used with vanilla lighting only, meaning it has included darker dungeons and has been worked around every vanilla weather.




[b]INSTALLATION:

[/b]Installation can always be tricky for new comers. I will try to break it down the best i can for you.

Things you will need:

[url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]ENB[/url] Go download the latest version of ENB for Skyrim.

[url=https://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]Winrar[/url] I highly recommend this for extracting files.
[url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]
ENBHelper[/url] I don't know the details, but you need this.

1. Once you've downloaded the latest ENB version available, (this ENB uses V0.315) extract the WrapperVersion to your desktop.
2. Download my ENB and extract the folder to your desktop.
3. Open the WrapperVersion folder, and place d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe into your Skyrim directory folder, (where the .exe are)
4. Open Natural Atmospheres ENB and copy/paste every file into your Skyrim directory.
5. Place ENBHelper into your Skyrim directory.
6. Bring up the in-game ENB menu with Shift+Enter.
7. Enjoy.
 
Please note that you may have to crank up the brightness in your game.

If you have any questions about the ENB do not hesitate to ask! I'll reply as soon as i can.

[b]RECOMMENDED ENVIRONMENT MODS:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1702/?]Immersive Skyrim Thunder V6[/url]
[url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]Particle Patch[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18266/?]Longer Weather Transitions[/url]

These should give you the overall effect that i am running on.

[/b]

[b]

CREDITS:
[/b] 
Boris for creating ENB <3
Dragens for allowing me to use assets
missleblanc for[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54553/?] Bokeh Depth of Field[/url]
